column4: hee i have strange problem .....I have installed vmware player .When i open that it is asking to open (*.vmx ) format.what to do now?
hee i have strange problem .....I have installed vmware player .When i open that it is asking to open (*.vmx ) format.what to do now?
i think that file is something telling the vmware wich machine are you emulating
you need to get one for the system you like to run on the VM
